snippet: At the ESPY Awards in Los Angeles, she also urged fellow athletes to make her cause theirs for the benefit of youths who face discrimination because of their identities.
lead_paragraph: At the ESPY Awards in Los Angeles, she also urged fellow athletes to make her cause theirs for the benefit of youths who face discrimination because of their identities.

headline.main: Caitlyn Jenner Says She’ll Push for Acceptance of Transgender People
